description:

description:
Bouvet er en spennende og sosial arbeidsplass med kontorer over hele Norge og i Sverige. Her kan du jobbe variert for alt fra store, offentlige akt√∏rer til sm√•, lokale bedrifter - alle med sine egne, unike utfordringer og l√¶ringsmuligheter.

Bouvet er opptatt av at de ansatte skal trives, og man har stor innflytelse p√• hva man √∏nsker √• jobbe med innenfor teknologi, r√•dgiving, design og kommunikasjon. Kompetanseheving prioriteres, og det er som regel alltid noe sosialt man kan slenge seg med p√•.

Vi vil forteller om livet som konsulent, hva vi holder p√• med og generelt hvordan det er √• jobbe i Bouvet. Bli med p√• en hyggelig presentasjon, s√• fortsetter kvelden med god mat og drikke p√• Escape.

description:
Join Us for the BCG Platinion Company event on September 16!

 Are you eager to see how your background and skills as Informatics student can make an impact in real-world business and tech challenges? We‚Äôre excited to invite you to a special evening of insights, problem-solving, and networking!

 

Quick facts

Company: BCG Platinion ‚Äì IT strategy consulting firm

Date: September 16, 16.15 ‚Äì approx. 19.15

Location: Campus

Content: Full company intro plus interactive case practice session to train your problem solving skills

 

 Who is BCG Platinion?

BCG Platinion is the department of Boston Consulting Group (BCG) that focuses on strategic IT consulting, advising C-levels of large clients on their business-critical challenges and projects around tech and digital. In teams of diverse backgrounds, you get to work in a global context with numerous international opportunities and a strong focus on your personal development ‚Äì nurtured by a feedback- and training-focused environment. It is the place for you when you wish to work on a strategic level, while leveraging your deep IT expertise ‚Äì steering tomorrow‚Äôs digital world! Projects with BCG Platinion ensure a steep learning curve within different industries, technologies and problem-solving-skills ‚Äì which their team will share examples of during the event. 

 

What‚Äôs on the agenda?

  • Company Introduction ‚Äì Learn who they are, what they do, and how they shape the future of the intersection of technology and business

  • Real-life Case Example ‚Äì Using an actual project experience, you will understand what challenges they work with and how to tackle them

  • Group Case Exercise ‚Äì Team up with fellow students to tackle complex task to experience what it‚Äôs like to work on a consulting case

 

Pizza & Networking

After the official session, we‚Äôll wrap up the evening with pizza, sodas and plenty of time to chat with the consultants and recruiting. This is your chance to ask questions, exchange ideas, and expand your network in a relaxed atmosphere.
teaser: Join Us for the BCG Platinion Company event on September 16!

description:
